Package com.brunom

Class Car

java.lang.Object
com.brunom.Car
public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a car with different driving modes, 4 seats, a gas tank and a battery and an engine that can be turned on or off.
Author:
brunom
See Also:
DriveMode, Passenger

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double accelerate​(double amount)
    Increases the car speed by a certain amount if the engine is on(depending on the number of passengers and their weight).

  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      private Car()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Car getInstance()
      Creates the Car instance if it does not already exist and returns it.
      Returns:
      the Car instance

    • deleteInstance

      public static void deleteInstance()
      Sets the car Instace to null.

    • resetState

      public void resetState()
      Resets speed, passengers, engine, fuel, battery and mode of the car.

    • toggleEngine

      public int toggleEngine()
      If the car is not moving, toggles the state of the engine(on/off).
      Returns:
      0 if the engine has been toogled successfully, -1 if there are no passengers, -2 if there is no fuel.

    • getTotalWeight

      public int getTotalWeight()
      Returns the weight of the car considering the passengers inside.
      Returns:
      the weight of the car considering the passengers inside.

    • setMode

      public int setMode​(DriveModeEnum mode)
      Setter for mode.
      Parameters:
      mode - the desired drive mode.
      Returns:
      0 if the mode has been changed successfully, -1 if the selected mode is illegal for the current car state.

    • canAccelerate

      public int canAccelerate()
      Determines if the car can accelerate.
      Returns:
      0 if the car can accelerate, -1 if the engine is off, -2 if there are no passenger.

    • accelerate

      public double accelerate​(double amount)
      Increases the car speed by a certain amount if the engine is on(depending on the number of passengers and their weight).
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of acceleration(from 0.0 to 1.0).
      Returns:
      the acceleration after considering the weight of the passengers if the acceleration is successful, -1 if the engine is off, -2 if there are no passengers.

    • brake

      public void brake()
      Reduces the speed of the car. The brake is regenerative.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Determines whether the car is full or not.
      Returns:
      a boolean representing whether the car is full or not.

    • addPassenger

      public int addPassenger​(Passenger passenger)
      Adds a passenger to the passengers list.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the passenger to add.
      Returns:
      0 if the passenger has been added successfully, -1 if all the car seats are occupied, -2 if the car is moving, -3 if the passenger is already in the car.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the current mode does not allow new passengers. The passenger will be added anyway.

    • removePassenger

      public Passenger removePassenger​(int index)
      Removes the passenger at the selected index if the car is not moving.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the passenger to remove.
      Returns:
      the removed passenger if the operation was sucessful, else null (if the car is moving).
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the selected index is out of range
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the current drive mode does not allow passengers removal.

    • removePassenger

      public boolean removePassenger​(Passenger p)
      Removes a passenger if the car is not moving.
      Parameters:
      p - the passenger to remove.
      Returns:
      a boolean representing whether the operation was successful or not.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the current drive mode does not allow passengers removal.

    • refuel

      public boolean refuel()
      If the car is not moving, fills up the gas tank.
      Returns:
      a boolean representing whether the operation was successful or not.

    • charge

      public boolean charge()
      If the car is not moving, charges the battery.
      Returns:
      a boolean representing whether the operation was successful or not.

    • printPassengers

      public void printPassengers()
      Prints the name and the weight of all the passengers inside the car.

    • printState

      public void printState()
      Prints the current state of the car: engine, speed, drive mode, passengers.
